content: Hey Friends -- should we cancel any of our calls around the holidays?

/poll Holiday availability
I will attend our regularly scheduled FHIRcast call on Dec 23rd.

Eric not available on 23rd or 30th. Gino is unavailable on 9, 23, and 30th.
